CookbooksRepo.Description: The github url for your custom cookbooks

CookbooksRef.Description: The git reference to checkout for custom cookbooks

CookbooksSshKey.Description: The ssh key needed to clone the cookbooks repo

Version.Description: Just a place holder for version

RabbitMQCertificateARN.Description: ARN of the certificate to use for rabbitmq

GithubOauthAppId.Description: Github Oauth App Id to use for doorman authentication. Leave empty for none.

GithubOauthSecret.Description: Github Oauth App Secret to use for doorman authentication. Leave empty for none.

GithubOauthOrganization.Description: Github Organization to allow through doorman

DoormanEnable.Description: Protect all internal resources through Doorman? If you are not deploying this privately through a VPN, this is recommended

DoormanSessionSecret.Description: A Secret Salt used to encrypt cookies for doorman

DoormanPassword.Description: Password to use for alternate authentication through doorman. Leave empty for none

OpsWorksStackColor.Description: RGB Color to use for OpsWorks Stack

RabbitMQInstanceType.Description: Enter m3.large, c3.large, or r3.large. Default is r3.large.

CarbonRelayInstanceType.Description: Enter m3.medium, m3.large, c3.large, or r3.large. Default is c3.large.

CarbonCacheInstanceType.Description: Enter m3.medium, m3.large, c3.large, or r3.large. Default is c3.large.

GraphiteWebInstanceType.Description: Enter m3.medium, m3.large, c3.large, or r3.large. Default is c3.large.

ElasticSearchInstanceType.Description: Enter m3.medium, m3.large, c3.large, or r3.large. Default is r3.large.

LogstashInstanceType.Description: Enter m3.medium, m3.large, c3.large, or r3.large. Default is c3.large.

DashboardInstanceType.Description: Enter m3.medium, m3.large, c3.large, or r3.large. Default is c3.large.

RabbitMQErlangCookie.Description: RabbitMQ Erlang Cookie. This should be unique per stack

GraphiteVolumeSize.Description: Size of disk in GB to use for graphite ebs volumes

ElasticSearchVolumeSize.Description: Size of disk in GB to use for elasticsearch ebs volumes

RabbitMQVolumeSize.Description: Size of disk in GB to use for elasticsearch ebs volumes

Route53ZoneId.Description: The zone id to add dns records to on instance setup. If empty updates won't happen

Route53DomainName.Description: The domain name to append to dns records

PagerDutyAPIKey.Description: The pagerduty api key if you want sensu alerts forwarded to pagerduty

RedisNodeType.Description: The compute and memory capacity of the nodes in the Redis Cluster
RedisNodeType.ConstraintDescription: must select a valid Cache Node type.
